page.title: 12Health
page.content:
The London Borough of Tower Hamlets is in North East Thames Regional Health Authority,which stretches from Southend to Bloomsbury.Of the 16 health areas in NETRHA Tower Hamlets has the highest birthrate & the highest infant mortality rate the highest % of births below 2,500 grammes the highest % of children in households dependent on supplementary benefit the highest % of overcrowded households the highest number of elderly receiving supplementary benefit the highest death rate
Robert Harding(11)
